description: Gets detailed information about an Add On subscription.

parameters.name: AddonSubscriptionId
parameters.description: The Add On subscription ID to retrieve information for.

nested_items.name: AddonName
nested_items.description: The name of the Add On for the subscription.

nested_items.name: AddonSubscriptionArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the subscription.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the Add On subscription was created.
